title: Biophysics
description: Physical principles applied to molecular and cellular biology. Topics include chemiosmosis, self-assembly, protein biosynthesis, and the mechanisms of muscle and nerve function.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2232 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
